ext.config.title: Code Settings Sync Configuration Settings
ext.config.gist: Settings Sync 要使用的 GitHub GIST ID.
ext.config.lastUpload: Settings Sync last upload date. Set it as empty if you want to manually hit download.
ext.config.lastDownload: Settings Sync last download date. Set it as empty if you want to manually hit download.
ext.config.autoDownload: 选项开启时，当 VSCode 启动时会自动下载设置。 [需要重启 VScode]
ext.config.autoUpload: 选项开启时，当设置有变动时会自动上传。 [需要重启 VScode]
ext.config.forceDownload: 如果你想在即使你已经同步到最新的设置的情况下仍然下载设置，请开启这个选项。
ext.config.forceUpload: 如果你想在 GIST 已有较新的设置的情况下仍然上传设置，请开启这个选项。
ext.config.host: 如果你想使用 GHE，请设置为你的 GitHub Enterprise 地址。
ext.config.pathPrefix: 如果你想使用 GHE，请设置为你的 GitHub Enterprise API 前缀. 通常是 '/api/v3'. 请在确认 Enterprise 主机使用此功能后再使用！
ext.config.quietSync: 开启这个选项后， 插件会在状态栏上展示结果，而非在摘要页面上展示。
ext.config.askGistName: 创建 gist 时询问名字。这有利于你在有多个 gist 的情况下进行区分。
ext.config.removeExtensions: 如果你不想在下载时移除插件，请关闭这个选项。
ext.config.syncExtensions: 如果你不想同步插件信息，请关闭这个选项。
cmd.howSetting.title: Sync: 如何设置
cmd.updateSettings.title: Sync: 更新/上传 设置
cmd.updateSettings.info.uploading: Sync: 正在 上传/更新你的设置。
cmd.updateSettings.info.uploadingDone: Sync: 上传完成。 GIST ID: {0}. 请保存好这个 ID，你在其他机器上可以用它来获取你的设置。
cmd.updateSettings.info.shareGist: Sync: 你可以分享你的 Id 给其他的插件用户来分享你的设置。
cmd.updateSettings.info.readding: Sync: 正在读取设置和扩展信息。
cmd.updateSettings.info.newGistCreated: Sync: 新 gist 已创建。
cmd.updateSettings.warning.noToken: Sync: 设置 GitHub Token 或者在 Sync 的设置文件中禁用 '下载公开的 Gist' 功能。
cmd.updateSettings.warning.OSNotSupporte: Sync: Pragma OS value {0} not supported at line {1}
cmd.updateSettings.error.readGistFail: Sync:  GIST ID: {0} 无法获取
cmd.downloadSettings.title: Sync: 下载设置
cmd.downloadSettings.info.readdingOnline: Sync: 正在读取在线设置。
cmd.downloadSettings.info.gotLatestVersi: Sync: 已经获取到您保存的最新设置。
cmd.downloadSettings.error.removeExtFail: Sync: 无法移除某些扩展。
cmd.downloadSettings.error.unableSave: Sync: 无法保存扩展列表文件。
cmd.resetSettings.title: Sync: 重置插件设置。
cmd.otherOptions.title: Sync: 高级选项。
cmd.otherOptions.editLocalSetting: Sync: 编辑本地插件设置
cmd.otherOptions.shareSetting: Sync: 使用公开的 GIST 分享设置
cmd.otherOptions.shareSetting.beforeConf: Sync: 这将会移除现在的 GIST 而且会上传设置到一个公开的新 GIST， 你是否要继续？
cmd.otherOptions.downloadSetting: Sync: 从公开的 GIST 下载设置
cmd.otherOptions.toggleForceDownload: Sync: 切换是否强制下载
cmd.otherOptions.toggleForceUpload: Sync: 切换是否强制上传
cmd.otherOptions.toggleAutoUpload: Sync: 切换是否开启在设置有变动时自动上传。
cmd.otherOptions.toggleAutoUpload.on: Sync: 在设置有变动时自动上传功能 已开启， 重启 VSCode 后生效。
cmd.otherOptions.toggleAutoUpload.off: Sync:在设置有变动时自动上传功能 已关闭。
cmd.otherOptions.toggleAutoDownload: Sync: 切换是否开启在 VSCode 启动时自动下载。
cmd.otherOptions.toggleAutoDownload.on: Sync: 在 VSCode 启动时自动下载功能 已开启。
cmd.otherOptions.toggleAutoDownload.off: Sync: 在 VSCode 启动时自动下载功能 已关闭。
cmd.otherOptions.toggleSummaryPage: Sync: 切换是否在 上传/下载 时展示详情页面(Summary Page)
cmd.otherOptions.preserve: Sync: Preserve Setting To Stop Override After Download
cmd.otherOptions.preserve.placeholder: Enter any Key from settings.json to preserve.
cmd.otherOptions.preserve.prompt: Example: Write 'http.proxy' => store this computer proxy and overwrite it , if set empty it will remove proxy.
cmd.otherOptions.preserve.info.done1: Sync: Done. {0} value will be removed from settings.json after downloading.
cmd.otherOptions.preserve.info.done2: Sync: Done. Extension will keep {0}: {1} in setting.json after downloading.
cmd.otherOptions.customizedSync: Sync: Add Custom Sync File path
cmd.otherOptions.customizedSync.placehol: Enter an absolute path of the additional uploaded file.
cmd.otherOptions.customizedSync.prompt: (ex. /path/to/.eslintrc) will be uploaded and downloaded to the specified path.
cmd.otherOptions.downloadCustomFile: Sync: Import Custom Sync File to workspace
cmd.otherOptions.downloadCustomFile.plac: Select the file you want to download to the root of the workspace you are working on.
cmd.otherOptions.quietSync.on: Sync: Status bar will be updated upon download/upload.
cmd.otherOptions.quietSync.off: Sync: Summary will be shown upon download/upload.
cmd.otherOptions.warning.tokenNotRequire: Sync: Settings Sync will not ask for GitHub Token from now on.
cmd.otherOptions.triggerReset: Sync: Do you want to reset the settings ?
common.info.installed: Sync: Settings created, thank you for installing!
common.info.needHelp: Sync: Need Help configuring this extension?
common.info.excludeFile: Sync: You can exclude any file/folder for upload and settings for download.
common.info.updating: Sync: Updating In Progress… Please Wait.
common.info.initAutoUpload: Sync: Auto Upload Initiating In {0} Seconds.
common.info.setToken: Sync: Now You can set your GitHub token manually in `syncLocalSettings.json`
common.info.donate: Sync: Do you like this extension? How about writing a review or sending a donation? ;)
common.error.message: Sync: Error Logged In Console (Help menu > Toggle Developer Tools).
common.error.connection: Sync: Internet Not Connected or Unable to Connect to GitHub. Exception Logged in Console
common.error.canNotSave: Sync: Unable to Save Settings. Please make sure you have valid JSON settings.json file. (e.g.: No trailing commas)
common.error.invalidToken: Sync: Invalid/Expired GitHub Token. Please generate new token with scopes mentioned in readme. Exception Logged in Console.
common.error.invalidGistId: Sync: Invalid Gist Id Entered. Verify your gist: https://gist.github.com/<your_userName>/<gist_id>.
common.placeholder.enterGithubAccessToke: 请输入你的 GitHub Personal Access Token
common.placeholder.enterGistId: 请输入要同步的 Gist Id
common.placeholder.multipleGist: Gist 的名字 (例如: 个人设置)
common.prompt.multipleGist: Allows you to identify the settings if you have multiple gist.
common.prompt.enterGistId: Enter Gist Id from previously uploaded settings. You can also set manually in code settings (sync.gist). Press [Enter] or [Esc] to cancel.
common.prompt.enterGithubAccessToken: You also manually add a token (User Folder/syncLocalSettings.json). Press [Enter] or [Esc] to cancel.
common.prompt.restartCode: Do you want to reload to apply extensions and configurations?
common.prompt.gistNewer: Sync: Gist has a newer or identical version of your settings. Do you want to enable forceUpload to override this?

ext.globalConfig.ignoreUploadFiles.name: 忽略的文件
ext.globalConfig.supportedFileExtensions: 每行输入一个文件扩展名
ext.globalConfig.gistDescription.name: Gist 描述
ext.globalConfig.autoUploadDelay.name: 自动上传延时
ext.globalConfig.autoUploadDelay.placeho: 输入自动上传的延时(单位: 秒)
ext.globalConfig.askGistName.name: 询问 Gist 名字
